short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Friday Night Funkin' is the place where the music count! Play multiple FNF Mods directly in your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Friday Night Funkin' or how all the players knows them - FNF, is a open source rhythmical game where you need to press arrows in order to dance and battle different antagonists.

The game was created by Ninjamuffin99, KawaiSprite, PhantomArcade3k and Evilsk8r in a Newground competition called Ludum Dare 47.

In the last update, we've introduce 3 new FNF Mods, so, now you can play:
1. Week 7
2. Vs Shaggy
3. Vs Garcello
4. Mid Fight Masses where you play agains Sarvente, Ruvyzvat (Ruv), Selever and Rasazy

After the competition was ended, the game had become one of the most popular indie games with thousands of fans. What is more cool is that because this is an open source game, the fan base started to create different mods, and the game popularity just boomed.

Friday Night Funkin' game have the following characters: Boyfriend, Girlfriend, Daddy Dearest, Mommy Mearest, Monster and Spirit. Beside them, we have some guest characters like Skid and Pump, Pico, Tankman and of course Whitty.

FNF game action is playing in 6 weeks where you have to battle different characters. 

In this extension you can play directly in your browser tab, without the need of downloading or surfing the web. Just press the extension icon and start playing directly - no ads!

If you like this type of games, you can find more FNF mods.

____

FAQ:

1. How can I play?
Click the extension. Click the game image to start. After that, press the game and DON'T PRESS ANYTHING ELSE EXEPT THE GAME. If you will press anything else, the game will stop!

[!] Keep your mouse cursor in the game area. If you move the cursor from the game area, the game will stop.

2. Where I can find the extension?
After you installed the Chrome extension, go to the Extension tab (in the top-right side, between search address and settings, you have to click a gray piece of puzzle). After you open the Extension tab, pin [FNF] Friday Night Funkin' Games extension. Now, whenever you want to play, just click the extension located in the top-right corner.

3. The game is not loading, what can I do?
To start the game, you have to click the game image from the top.

4. I clicked the game image, but the game won't work
If the game is still not loading for you, try to press the "Fullscreen" button from the bottom of the page. In this way, the game will open in a new tab. If this won't solve your issue, please press the "Refresh" button.

5. The game is stuck at a point. What can I do?
It is a known issue that the game from time to time will get stuck and freeze. When this problem occurs, just press the "Refresh" button and try again.

____

Updates:

20 March 2023
- decreasing the size from 379MB to 189MB
- fixing bugs
- fixing Chrome guidelines
- adding a feedback when you remove the extension to know what we should improve

01 January 2023
- fixing bugs
- adding new game loading to reduce the extension time to open
- adding 3 more mods

08 June 2021
- added new game files
- minor bugs reported fixed
- the game now loads instant, without crashing, so, you can play FNF online without interrupting

19 Apr 2021
- game files
- donation links according with the developers fundraising from Kickstarter
- buttons for full-screen and refresh the game
- we added Friday Night Funkin' Week 7

07 Apr 2021
- we have changed the game files because many of the players reported that the game was glitchy has poor performance

22 Dec 2022
- we fixed some bugs, and eliminate some useless functionality
